name: saasan
description: Saasan - Anti-corruption platform for Nepal with viral features

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:dashboard" "npm run dev:mobile"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd saasan-node-be && npm install && cd ../saasan-dashboard-react && npm install && cd ../saasan-mobile-rn && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:dashboard
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:env && npm run setup:database
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:dashboard && npm run test:mobile
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:dashboard && npm run lint:mobile
scripts.clean: npm run clean:deps && npm run clean:build
scripts.clean:deps: rm -rf node_modules && cd saasan-node-be && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../saasan-dashboard-react && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../saasan-mobile-rn && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.clean:build: cd saasan-node-be && rm -rf dist && cd ../saasan-dashboard-react && rm -rf dist

author: Saasan Team
